DatabaseÂ¶

Schema: See the Django model at djangoOligo/app/models.py or view the actual data in mySql.

Load new data by updating the json file at djangoOligo/app/fixtures/oligo.json and using the django manager to load it with:

python manage.py loaddata oligo.json
